post.body: lol goodness lol
rotflmao
LOL and I was gonna see that movie tonight too...guess it's a good thing I didn't...
I'm not gonna lie...I've watched that show a couple of times too
lol
My favorites are Streetlights, Robocop, and Heartless... Robocop just makes me laugh...
Stop frontin like u didn't enjoy their album
Home from shopping @ Wally World...cooking something to eat
Okay...first time watching "I am Legend"...what a movie...
Watching "The Net"...that movie is crazy!!!
Awwww Kira's coming out to pick me up! How sweet!
Stuck @ the mall...my sister's car won't start
On break... I can't believe i'm here til midnight!
Omg...the traffic @ the mall... Bananas!!!
Heading to the mall to do some last minute shopping...then work @ LB until midnight :o/
Okay so I'm suppose to be wrapping gifts...but I got caught up trying to change my twitter background lol
Finally made it home...looks like I gotta cancel any plans I made for tonight..boooo @ that!
Got to leave work early due to the weather...the roads are bad!
I saw the little kids @ the party and said "they're so cute" at least 112 times...lawd help me when I have some of my own...
The Dinner party we had turned out to be a success...so many little kids. I can predict the way our event in February will turn out...
